title: Online Job-Embedded Learning Program for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Current Teaching Professionals with Experience in Lesson Design and Digital Tool Integration
context.additional_context: Customized corporate training to enhance teacher competencies, focusing on improving practical applicability through VR simulations of real classroom scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate instructional design competencies utilizing digital technologies in workplace settings with ≥80% accuracy
Through teacher collaboration simulations, learners implement feedback-driven instructional improvement strategies ≥3 times
Learners design and execute ≥2 lessons incorporating 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, creativity, etc.) in VR-based virtual classrooms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
